howToPractice.title: How to Practice
instructions: Find a comfortable position - sitting or standing
Press start and stop everything you're doing
Focus solely on your breath and surroundings
Observe how it feels to pause completely
A gentle chime will sound when the minute is complete

reflection.title: Reflection
reflection.prompt: After your mindful pause, take a moment to reflect on the experience.
reflection.question: How did it feel to pause completely? What did you notice?
reflection.placeholder: Describe your experience... What sensations did you notice? How did your mind respond to the stillness? What thoughts arose?
